author: AAA3A
name: PresenceChart
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. If you enjoy my work, please consider donating on [Buy Me a Coffee](<https://www.buymeacoffee.com/aaa3a>) or [Ko-Fi](<https://ko-fi.com/aaa3a>)!
short: A cog to make a chart with the different Discord statuses (presence) of a Discord member, in the previous x days (last 100 days maximum)!
description: A cog to make a chart with the different Discord statuses (presence) of a Discord member, in the previous x days (last 100 days maximum)!
end_user_data_statement: This cog store the differents statuses (presence) of the users, with the starting date-time (last 100 days maximum).
